casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brandon MALONE 379A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 9, 2017 Paul M. Green, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Malone, Brandon. Jess D. Mekeel, Assistant Attorney General, Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of November 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of November 2017."
